text: Pedzezvo takave tinoita Nutfah (musanganiswa wemvura yababa naamai) kuti ive godo reropa, tikave tinoita godo reropa kuti rive chidimbu chenyama, tikave tinogadzira mapfupa kubva muchidimbu chenyama, tikave tinoshongedza mapfupa nenyama, uye tikave tinochiunza sechimwe chisikwa. Naizvozvo makomborero nde aAllah musiki akanaka
